args.content:
import Mathlib

variable (X : Type*) [MetricSpace X]

/-- The bounded continuous real-valued functions on X. -/
def C_b : Type* := { f : X → Real // Continuous f ∧ ∃ M : Real, 0 ≤ M ∧ ∀ x, |f x| ≤ M }

/-- Supremum distance (uniform distance) on bounded functions. -/
def sup_dist (f g : C_b X) : Real := Sup (Set.range fun x => |(f.1 x) - (g.1 x)|)

/-- The space of bounded continuous functions with the supremum distance is a metric space. -/
theorem C_b_metric_space : MetricSpace (C_b X) := by sorry

/-- Convergence with respect to the supremum distance is equivalent to uniform convergence. -/
theorem uniform_iff_sup_converge (u : ℕ → C_b X) (f : C_b X) :
  (∀ ε : Real, ε > 0 → ∃ N, ∀ n ≥ N, ∀ x, |(u n).1 x - f.1 x| < ε) ↔
  (∀ ε : Real, ε > 0 → ∃ N, ∀ n ≥ N, sup_dist X (u n) f < ε) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]

/-- The bounded continuous real-valued functions on X. -/
def C_b : Type* := { f : X → Real // Continuous f ∧ ∃ M : Real, 0 ≤ M ∧ ∀ x, Real.abs (f x) ≤ M }

/-- Supremum distance (uniform distance) on bounded functions. -/
def sup_dist (f g : C_b) : Real := SupSet.sSup (Set.range fun x => Real.abs ((f.1 x) - (g.1 x)))

/-- The space of bounded continuous functions with the supremum distance is a metric space. -/
theorem C_b_metric_space : MetricSpace C_b := by sorry

/-- Convergence with respect to the supremum distance is equivalent to uniform convergence. -/
theorem uniform_iff_sup_converge (u : ℕ → C_b) (f : C_b) :
  (∀ ε : Real, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, ∀ x : X, Real.abs ((u n).1 x - f.1 x) < ε) ↔
  (∀ ε : Real, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, sup_dist (u n) f < ε) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]

/-- The bounded continuous real-valued functions on X. -/
def C_b : Type* := { f : X → Real // Continuous f ∧ ∃ M : Real, 0 ≤ M ∧ ∀ x, abs (f x) ≤ M }

/-- Supremum distance (uniform distance) on bounded functions. -/
def sup_dist (f g : C_b) : Real := SupSet.sSup (Set.range fun x => abs ((f.1 x) - (g.1 x)))

/-- The space of bounded continuous functions with the supremum distance is a metric space. -/
instance C_b_metric_space : MetricSpace C_b := by sorry

/-- Convergence with respect to the supremum distance is equivalent to uniform convergence. -/
theorem uniform_iff_sup_converge (u : ℕ → C_b) (f : C_b) :
  (∀ ε : Real, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, ∀ x : X, abs ((u n).1 x - f.1 x) < ε) ↔
  (∀ ε : Real, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, sup_dist (u n) f < ε) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable (X : Type*) [MetricSpace X]

/-- Bounded continuous real-valued functions on X. -/
structure C_b where
  to_fun : X → ℝ
  continuous_to_fun : Continuous to_fun
  bounded : ∃ M : ℝ, 0 ≤ M ∧ ∀ x, abs (to_fun x) ≤ M

/-- Supremum (uniform) distance on bounded continuous functions. -/
def sup_dist (f g : C_b X) : ℝ := SupSet.sSup (Set.range fun x => abs (f.to_fun x - g.to_fun x))

/-- The space of bounded continuous functions with the supremum distance is a metric space. -/
instance metric_space_C_b : MetricSpace (C_b X) := by sorry

/-- Convergence in the sup metric is equivalent to uniform convergence. -/
theorem uniform_iff_sup_converge (u : ℕ → C_b X) (f : C_b X) :
  (∀ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, ∀ x : X, abs ((u n).to_fun x - f.to_fun x) < ε) ↔
  (∀ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, sup_dist X (u n) f < ε) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable (X : Type*) [MetricSpace X]

/-- Bounded continuous real-valued functions on X. -/
structure Cb where
  to_fun : X → ℝ
  continuous_to_fun : Continuous to_fun
  bounded : ∃ M : ℝ, 0 ≤ M ∧ ∀ x, abs (to_fun x) ≤ M

/-- Supremum (uniform) distance on bounded continuous functions. -/
noncomputable def sup_dist (f g : Cb X) : ℝ := SupSet.sSup (Set.range fun x => abs (f.to_fun x - g.to_fun x))

/-- The space of bounded continuous functions with the supremum distance is a metric space. -/
noncomputable instance metric_space_Cb : MetricSpace (Cb X) := by sorry

/-- Convergence in the sup metric is equivalent to uniform convergence. -/
theorem uniform_iff_sup_converge (u : ℕ → Cb X) (f : Cb X) :
  (∀ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, ∀ x : X, abs ((u n).to_fun x - f.to_fun x) < ε) ↔
  (∀ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε → ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ n ≥ N, sup_dist X (u n) f < ε) := by sorry
